DataElement.preferredName: Prior Personal Medical History Relevant Infectious Disease Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe a patient's other prior history of relevant infectious diseases not specified elsewhere.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Personal Medical History Relevant Infectious Disease Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced._The relation of something to the matter at hand._A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact. -- 2003_Description; a statement that represents something in words.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: The relation of something to the matter at hand.:A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact. -- 2003:Description; a statement that represents something in words.

Concepts.definition: The relation of something to the matter at hand.
A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by B. McClure-Shimel. mc 5/12/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not otherwise specified.:Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/22/17 tt transferred context, added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task. Modified for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg (JP) 12/2010.
